SELECT A.VHC_ID ,A.VHC_NO ,A.COMP_ID ,A.CHAS_NO ,A.AREA ,A.MAKER ,DATE_FORMAT(A.RELS_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') RELS_DT ,A.MODEL_NM ,A.ROUT_DIV ,A.VHC_TYPE ,A.VHC_KIND ,A.VHC_FUEL ,A.REMARK ,IF(C.COMPLETE_YN = 'N', '예약중', NULL) RSV_STATE ,B.MNG_ID ,C.RSV_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(D.RSV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') RSV_DT ,IF(A.USE_YN = 'Y', '사용', NULL) USE_YN ,E.COMP_NM FROM sbrt.BMS_VHC_MST A LEFT JOIN sbrt.BMS_DVC_INFO B ON A.VHC_ID = B.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN sbrt.BMS_VOC_RSV_RST_INFO C ON B.MNG_ID = C.MNG_ID AND COMPLETE_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN sbrt.BMS_VOC_RSV_INFO D ON C.RSV_ID = D.RSV_ID LEFT JOIN sbrt.BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST E ON A.COMP_ID = E.COMP_ID WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.MNG_ID IS NOT NULL
AND A.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
GROUP BY A.VHC_ID ORDER BY A.VHC_ID

SELECT A.VHC_ID , SUBSTRING(A.MNG_ID, 1, 10) AS IMP_ID , A.DVC_ID , A.MNG_ID , A.DVC_KIND , B.DL_CD , B.DL_CD_NM , B.TXT_VAL1 , B.TXT_VAL2 , B.TXT_VAL3 , B.NUM_VAL4 , B.NUM_VAL5 , B.NUM_VAL6 FROM BMS_DVC_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO B ON A.DVC_KIND = B.DL_CD WHERE A.VHC_ID = #{VHC_ID} AND B.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' AND B.TXT_VAL1 = 'RD' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
